Issue.creator: grapebaba
Issue.description: Many systems supports preallocating space for the WAL which can reduce the data that needs to be synced whenever {{fdatasync}} is called. In particular, if we pre-extend the size of the file, calling {{fdatasync}} will only need to write the data blocks and not the inode. We think it can be used in ledger file storage. ~manish-sethi ~denyeart
